Alchemical Crafting: May use Crafting to create alchemical items/Knows formulas for four common 1st-level alchemical items
Assurance (Deception): May forgo rolling a Deception check for an automatic 32
Assurance (Thievery): May forgo rolling a Thievery check for an automatic 32
Clever Improviser: May use any skill untrained
Hunt Prey: (1) +2 Perception to Seek and +2 Survival to Track designated creature
Infused Reagents: May create 21 batches of infused reagents each day
Perpetual Infusions: May create 2 alchemical items of up to level 11 from research field without using infused reagents
Quick Alchemy: (1) May use batches of infused reagents to create 3 alchemical items of up to level 18 for 1 turn
Research Field: Using Advanced Alchemy creates 3 signature items from research field
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 260 Armor Class: 37 (dexterity; expert) Class DC: Alchemist: 37 (intelligence; master); Fighter: 14 (strength; trained); Monk: 14 (strength; trained); Ranger: 14 (strength; trained); Rogue: 17 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Fist (+27 1d6+2 B; dexterity; expert)
Combat Notes:
Alchemical Expertise: Class Expert (Alchemist)
Alchemical Mastery: Class Master (Alchemist)
Alchemical Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Alchemical Bombs; Unarmed Attacks)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +54
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +5
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +5
Diverse Weapon Expert: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons)/Attack Trained (Advanced Weapons)
Fighter Dedication: Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons)/Class Trained (Fighter)

Monk Dedication: Attack Trained (Unarmed Attacks)/Class Trained (Monk)
Monk Resiliency: +21 Hit Points
Powerful Fist: Fists inflict 1d6 HP damage
Ranger Dedication: Class Trained (Ranger)
Ranger Resiliency: +15 Hit Points
Rogue Dedication: Class Trained (Rogue)/Defense Trained (Light Armor)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Weapon Proficiency (Javelin): Attack Trained (Javelin)
Weapon Proficiency (Lance): Attack Trained (Lance)
Weapon Proficiency (Lesser Thunderstone): Attack Trained (Lesser Thunderstone)
Attack Of Opportunity: (R) May make a melee Strike on foe that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer flat-footed to foes of equal or lower level
Field Discovery: Using Advanced Alchemy creates 3 alchemical items from research field
Flurry Of Blows: (1) May make 2 Unarmed Strikes 1/turn
Formula Book: Has a book that contains at least 44 alchemical formulas
Greater Field Discovery (Mutagenist): May use 2 polymorphic mutagens simultaneously
Hunt Prey: (1) Suffers no distance penalty for ranged Strikes in the 2nd range increment against designated creature
Incredible Improvisation: (F) May add +4 to an untrained skill check 1/day
Mutagenic Flashback: (F) May regain the effects of a mutagen consumed earlier in the day for 1 min 1/day
Powerful Alchemy: Items created with Quick Alchemy have DC 37
Powerful Fist: Suffers no attack penalty for inflicting lethal damage with unarmed attacks
Sneak Attack: +1d6 HP damage vs. flat-footed foe with agile, finesse, or ranged weapons
Surprise Attack: May use Deception or Stealth for initiative to inflict flat-footed on creatures that haven't acted
Weapon Specialization: +2/+3/+4 HP damage with expert/master/legendary weapon proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +27 (constitution; master); Reflex: +29 (dexterity; master); Will: +26 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Evasion: Save Master (Reflex)
Evasiveness: Save Master (Reflex)
Iron Will: Save Expert (Will)
Juggernaut: Save Master (Fortitude)
Perfection's Path (Fortitude): Save Master (Fortitude)
Evasion: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental control are critical successes/Foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
Juggernaut: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: A0: 2; A1: 2; A2: 2; A3: 2; A4: 2; A5: 2; A6: 1; A7: 1; O0: 2; O1: 2; O2: 2; O3: 2; O4: 2; O5: 2; O6: 1; O7: 1 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Arcane: +27 (intelligence; master); Occult: +24 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Arcane: 37 (intelligence; master); Occult: 34 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Protective Ward (A1 Abj): (1) 5' emanation gives +1 AC while sustained for up to 1 min; radius increases by 5' for every sustain
Tentacular Limbs (O1 Tra): (1) Extends caster reach for touch spells and unarmed Strikes to 10', and adding another action to touch spells extends reach to 20', for 1 min (heightened +2 adding another action extends touch spell reach to 30')
Magic Notes:
Arcane Breadth: +1 arcane spell slot of each level up to 5
Arcane School Spell: Knows the Protective Ward spell/Has a focus pool with 1 focus point
Basic Bloodline Spell: Knows the Tentacular Limbs spell/Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point
Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting: Knows 1 1st-level, 1 2nd-level, and 1 3rd-level occult spell
Basic Wizard Spellcasting: Knows 1 1st-level, 1 2nd-level, and 1 3rd-level arcane spell
Bloodline Breadth: +1 occult spell slot of each level up to 5
Expert Sorcerer Spellcasting: Spell Expert (Occult)/Knows 1 4th-level, 1 5th-level, and 1 6th-level occult spell
Expert Wizard Spellcasting: Spell Expert (Arcane)/Knows 1 4th-level, 1 5th-level, and 1 6th-level arcane spell
Master Sorcerer Spellcasting: Spell Master (Occult)/Knows 1 7th-level occult spell
Master Wizard Spellcasting: Spell Master (Arcane)/Knows 1 7th-level arcane spell
Sorcerer Dedication: Spell Trained (Occult)/Knows 2 occult cantrips
Wizard Dedication: Spell Trained (Arcane)/May prepare 2 arcane cantrips each day
Effortless Concentration: (F) May extend the duration of 1 spell
Inspirational Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
Steady Spellcasting: A successful DC 15 flat check negates self spellcasting disruption
Wizard Dedication: Owns a spellbook with 4 arcane cantrips
Notes
Validation Errors: Class Feats Allocation: 23 available vs. 44 allocated
